title: Mage
description: Masters of arcane arts, wielding devastating spells to decimate foes from afar and providing strategic support with their magical abilities.

title: Rogue
description: Masters of stealth and precision, employing swift, deadly strikes and tactical maneuvering to exploit weaknesses and control the battlefield.

title: Knight
description: Brave and resilient warriors who excel in frontline combat, absorbing damage and delivering powerful strikes to protect allies.

title: Bard
description: Charming and versatile performers, inspiring allies and confounding enemies with their melodic skills and supportive maneuvers.
